text: (napiyē! Inta) nayavañcakarkaḷai nīr kavaṉikkavillaiyā? Avarkaḷ, vētattai uṭaiyavarkaḷil uḷḷa nirākarikkum taṅkaḷ cakōtararkaḷai nōkki ‘‘nīṅkaḷ (uṅkaḷ illattai viṭṭu) veḷiyēṟṟappaṭṭāl nāṅkaḷum uṅkaḷuṭaṉ veḷiyēṟiviṭuvōm. Uṅkaḷ viṣayattil (uṅkaḷukku virōtamāka) nāṅkaḷ oruvarukkum, oru kālattilum kaṭṭuppaṭa māṭṭōm. (Evarum) uṅkaḷai etirttu pōr purintāl, niccayamāka nām uṅkaḷukku utavi purivōm'' eṉṟu kūṟukiṉṟaṉar. Āṉāl, niccayamāka avarkaḷ poyyarkaḷ eṉṟu allāh cāṭciyam kūṟukiṟāṉ
